ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: asking, 'When is the Day of Judgement?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They ask: "When is the Day of Judgement?" --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They ask: “When will the Day of Judgement be?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They ask, "When it will be the Day of Judgment?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They ask, “When will be the Day of Judgement?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They ask: "When will be the Day of Ad-Din"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They ask: When is the day of judgment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: asking, 'When shall be the Day of Doom?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They ask: When is the Day of Judgment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They ask, "When will the Day of Judgement come?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They ask: when is the Day of Requital coming?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They ask, ‘When will be the Day of Retribution?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They ask, "When will be the Day of Judgment and Justice?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They ask; "When will be the Day of Recompense?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When will the Day of Judgement be' they ask.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They ask, “When is the Day of Judgment?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:12] They ask, the Prophet, asking [him] derisively: ‘When is the Day of Judgement?’, in other words, ‘when will it come?’, and the response [given] to them is that it will come:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They) the Banu Makhzum (ask) you, Muhammad: (When is the Day of Judgement) in which we will be chastised?
